name: One-Legged Hero
description:
Football is gaining opoularity in your village. As a result, the rising stars of that sport need new legs to replace the damaged ones. Unfortunately, your leg was taken for this exact purpose. Playing as a provincial farmer, you need to get it back.

Complete levels with different levels of difficulty, and remember: don't lose your head. (And your remaining leg.)

Game was made by ReddBear, Krystian and Vacca in Godot
